_header: Sweet Jesu that was of maiden born
Note: Lines 1-5 similar to lines 1-3, 6 of 2818 (Vernon); lines 1-4 similar to first two lines of stanzas 1, 4 of 2883; lines 6-9 same as 2840.
Subjects: Christ, wounds of; penance; composite texts
Versification: — two-line, three-line, four-line — aa, aaa, aaaa
_description: A penance prayer composed from prayer tags, in an English sermon — eleven lines in couplets, triplet, quatrain

CULAdd2829.First Lines:
Swete Ihesu þat was of maydyn bornemy body nor my sowle lett
                    þem neuer be lorne…
CULAdd2829.Last Lines:
…And brynge it on to þe blisse of heuynþat neuer
                    schll naue ende amen
CULAdd2829.Editions:
O’Mara,  Veronica M. 
             “A Middle English Versified Penance Composed of Popular Prayer
                Tags.” 
             Notes and Queries
         n.s. 33 [231] (1986): 449-50: 449-50.
